data.eml:eml: A new species and a new record of the Southeast Asian millipede genus Antheromorpha Jeekel, 1968 (Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, I. Golovatch, Sergei, Semenyuk, Irina, Panha, Somsak (2019): A new species and a new record of the Southeast Asian millipede genus Antheromorpha Jeekel, 1968 (Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae) from Vietnam. ZooKeys 832: 77-89, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.832.32596, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.832.32596
